skillTree.localised_description: Duellists are usually more comfortable fighting on solid ground rather than on a snorting beast, but they are also adaptable people at heart.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit can fire while on the move.

skillTree.localised_description: Charge and fire with all weapons! They won't expect that.
Where there is a loaded pistol, there is hope.
A long mission outside the city requires to be locked and loaded. For Orcs.
Not all of the really great duellists can dream of becoming a full-pledged Knight Encarmine, but certainly all the Knights Encarmine are great duellists.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

skillTree.localised_description: The Goddess of Battle protects Her own.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +35%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +50%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: It's good to have someone watching your back against foes looking for a cheap kill. Especially if they know everything about it.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: The best Duellists tend to draw the attention of colleagues who'd love to challenge and learn from them, in a non-specific order.

effects.description:
Ability: "Feint & Riposte" for Duellists and Montante Swordsmen
	(all units in army)

skillTree.localised_description: It is poor form to duel someone without first introducing yourself. Of course, it's a good chance to make the opponent angry and clumsy.
The Duellist explains in detail, more or less politely and technically, how they'll win. More or less.
The Duellist takes pause to analyse and criticise the opponent's fighting technique. The verbal assault is occasionally polite but always substantial.
With a last and complex flourish, the Duellist has a last word on the duel. The opponent likely wishes they were dead at this point.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit's vigour is less affected by fatiguing actions, such as combat.

skillTree.localised_description: "Stay in one place, gods-damn you!"
Those who are fleet of foot can reach the enemy faster.
The harder they hit, the more they commit, the easier it is to strike back.
"The enemy's fear; their blood spilt in the mud – these are the things that sustain me."
The sword is the axis of the world and its power is absolute.
"You shoulda seen him, he was-a like a capitone! Kinda greasy, too."

related_attributes.bullet_text: When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any attacker.

skillTree.localised_description: A parrying dagger won't protect you from darts, but a strike will never hurt you if you know your trigonometry.
A surgical strike at the enemy's sword-hand, and the duel ends before it has even begun.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: "What do you mean 'You killed my father, prepare to die'? How can you say that when there are about thirty-six pretenders to that role, by today's count! In guardia!"

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: "I am not here to inspire, I am here to kill - come let us draw blades together!"

effects.description: Scavenge action: Income from post-battle loot is increased by an additional 3%
Scavenge action: Income from post-battle loot is increased by an additional 8%
Scavenge action: Income from post-battle loot is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: Such magic-users may be wise and able to offer sage advice, especially if they have scried the region.

effects.description: Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 2%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 4%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 6%

skillTree.localised_description: They cannot stop what they cannot see.

effects.description: Damage Walls action: 1 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 2 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 3 additional wall breaches

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -3%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: The Duellist is loyal to the teachings of the father of fencing, focused on balance.
If Figuera is the father of fencing, Estevan is the bastard son. This Duellist uses the off-hand as a lightning-quick defensive tool.

If Figuera is the father of fencing, Casanova is the impertinent grandchild. Like the adventurous teacher, the Duellist focuses on agility of foot and bedazzling assaults that put an end to the fight as soon as possible.
